meanings.definition: A person who advocates or practices division or separation.
meanings.sent1: The divisionist believed in splitting things apart.
meanings.sent2: The teacher warned against being a divisionist in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The divisionist at the meeting suggested dividing the tasks based on colors.
meanings.sent4: Her divisive attitude made her the divisionist of the group.
meanings.sent5: The divisionist's actions tore the team apart, causing chaos.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to division or separation.
meanings.sent1: The divisionist policy led to conflicts among the members.
meanings.sent2: The divisionist approach aimed to create distinct groups.
meanings.sent3: The divisionist design of the room made it look like two separate spaces.
meanings.sent4: The divisionist mindset created barriers where there were none.
meanings.sent5: The divisionist nature of the project highlighted the differences clearly.
